header.title: Event Planning Meeting for Dime Savvy Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming Event
header.purpose: To discuss plans for the upcoming events, focusing on logistics, budget, and marketing.
header.attendees: Alia, Sebastian, Azfar, Jet, Kang, Rohimi

tasks.Description: Finalize power strip specifications for the Dime Savvy car showcase staging plan.
Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability for the Dime Savvy event.
Inform the trolling cart driver to stick with the Central Court for the car showcase.
Push Jumbo Rentals for at least a 10% cut on the sound system quote for the Dime Savvy event.
Draft the Shaver Gaming media invites and lock in cam limbs, Twitch slot.
Send out Dime Savvy media invites.
Confirm the costume rack specs with Tech Zone and email the sketch for the Shaver Gaming event.
Submit the police traffic permit applications for both events.
Follow up with the fire department regarding the COVID-19 SOP and fire safety clearance for both events.
Confirm the concrete delivery date for the VR demo gear for Shaver Gaming with the vendor and update the shared document.
Map out specific routes and timings for loading and unloading cars (Dime Savvy) and gaming equipment (Shaver Gaming) with security.
Coordinate closely with mall operators to ensure minimal disruption to mall goers during setup and teardown for both events.
Talk to Esports Channel about featuring a segment on the CYD Nova EV and Autobuzz about a casual gaming peripheral review type to the Shaver Gaming event.
Reach out to HyperX and Logitech, the Shaver Gaming sponsors, to explore cross-promotional opportunities.
Chase the fire department to get the New G Store renovation fire safety clearance sorted.
